data.caption: The Standalone Audited Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter And Year Ended March 31, 2023
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that at the Board Meeting held today, i.e., Monday, 29th May, 2023 at 03.30 P.M., the Board of Directors of the company considered and discussed the following items: -

1. Considered and Approved the Standalone Audited Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Year ended March 31, 2023 (the Audited Financial Results) along with the Auditors' Report.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that at the Board Meeting held today, i.e., Monday, 29th May, 2023 at 03.30 P.M., the Board of Directors of the company considered and discussed the following items: -

1. Considered and Approved the Standalone Audited Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Year ended March 31, 2023 (the Audited Financial Results) along with the Auditors' Report.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held Today I.E. Tuesday, 15Th November, 2022
data.news_body:
the Board of Directors in their meeting held today, i.e. on Tuesday, 15th November, 2022 at 03.00 PM, at the registered office of the Company has considered and discussed the following:

1. Considered and approved the Unaudited Financial Results of the company for the half-year ended 30th September, 2022 along with Limited Review Report;
2. Appointed Mr. Tushar Vora of M/s. Tushar Vora & Associates, Company Secretaries, as Secretarial Auditor of the company for the Financial Year 2022-23;
3. Appointed Ms. Zalak Kaushikbhai Choksi as Internal Auditor of the company for the Financial Year 2022-23;
The Board meeting commenced at 03.00 PM and concluded at 6.05 pm.

This is for your kind perusal. We request you to take the same on your record.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
Dear Sir / Madam,

We wish to inform you that at the Board Meeting held today, i.e. Monday, 30th May, 2022 at 03.30 PM, the Board of Directors of the company considered and discussed the following items: -

1. Considered and approved the Standalone Audited Financial Results of the Company for the Financial Year ended March 31, 2022 and half-yearly results for the half-year ended March 31, 2022 along with the Auditors' Report.

This is for your kind perusal. We request you to take the same on your record.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held Today I.E. Monday, 15Th November, 2021
data.news_body:
Dear Sir / Ma'am,
With reference to the captioned subject this is to inform you that, the Board of Directors in their meeting held today, i.e. on Monday, 15th November, 2021 at 02.00 PM, at the registered office of the Company has considered and discussed the following:

1. Considered and approved the Unaudited Financial Results of the company for the half-year ended 30th September, 2021 along with Limited Review Report;
2. Appointed Mr. Tushar Vora of M/s. Tushar Vora & Associates, Company Secretaries, as Secretarial Auditor of the company for the Financial Year 2021-22;
3. Appointed Ms. Zalak Kaushikbhai Choksi as Internal Auditor of the company for the Financial Year 2021-22;
4. Approved the Related Party Transactions.

The Board meeting commenced at 02.00 PM and concluded at 3.50 pm.

This is for your kind perusal. We request you to take the same on your record.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Held Today, I.E. Tuesday, 29Th June, 2021 At 03.00 PM
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that at the Board Meeting held today, i.e. Tuesday, 29th June, 2021 at 03.00 PM, the Board of Directors of the company considered and discussed the following items: -
1.Considered and approved appointment of Mr. Niraj Gemawat as the Managing Director of the Company;
2.Considered and approved the Standalone Audited Financial Results of the Company for the Financial Year ended March 31, 2021 and half-yearly results for the half-year ended March 31, 2021 along with the Auditors' Report;
3.Approved declaration of Audit Report with unmodified opinion in respect of Standalone Financial Statements for the Financial Year ended March 31, 2021 under SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015;
4.Approved the Related Party Transactions of the company entered during the Financial Year 2020 -21, subject to the approval of Shareholders in the ensuing AGM of the Company along with approvals related to the same for the Financial Year 2021-22.
